title: ICI logo font, sans
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105124218im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ici_5719.gif)

Is it custom? Any suggestions for something close? Thanks!

(WhatTheFont says Goudy Sans, but it’s not quite there...)

 [‹ PLEASE what font is this ?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105124218/http:/typophile.com/node/40528 "Go to previous forum topic") [circular C ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105124218/http:/typophile.com/node/40509 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pidgin

comments.content:
<cite>Is it custom?</cite>

Hi Alex,  
I reckon. Custom and ugly … Why do you need this one? Do you have to recreate/expand this thing?  
F

I agree, it’s ugly. Here’s the whole logo:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105124218im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ici2_4926.gif)

I was just playing around with it in Photoshop (does boredom count as an excuse? :) ). It’s a very well-known logo in the UK.

Ah, I see … ;°)  
If you like spikey serifs, you might wanna have a look at [ITC Serif Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080105124218/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/itc_serif_gothic_std_heavy/?sample_text=ABCDEFGH&sample_size=144).
